      • filter

        public Throwable filter(Throwable source,
                        boolean recursive)
        Description copied from interface: StackTraceFilterer
        Remove all apparently Micronaut-internal trace entries from the exception instance. This modifies the original instance and returns it, it does not clone.
        Specified by:
        filter in interface StackTraceFilterer
        Parameters:
        source - The source exception
        recursive - Whether to recursively filter the cause
        Returns:
        The exception passed in, after cleaning the stack trace
